controls.title: Enforce S3 Object Ownership (Disable ACLs)
controls.description: Set "Bucket owner enforced" on all relevant S3 buckets to disable ACLs and centralize access via IAM.
controls.security_risk: ACLs can cause unintended public access and ownership conflicts.
controls.default_behavior_limitations: ACLs may be enabled; change requires explicit configuration.
controls.automation: Use AWS CLI or IaC; monitor with an AWS Config rule.
merged_from_titles: Disable ACLs by Enforcing Object Ownership

controls.title: Require TLS for S3 (SecureTransport)
controls.description: Enforce HTTPS-only access using a bucket policy condition "aws:SecureTransport": "true".
controls.security_risk: Without TLS, data in transit can be intercepted or modified.
controls.default_behavior_limitations: S3 supports HTTP/HTTPS; some legacy clients may attempt HTTP.
controls.automation: Add bucket policy and monitor with AWS Config managed rule s3-bucket-ssl-requests-only.
